Known Usage Locations

Annotation

Specific Elements

Description

Identifies a collection of specific elements via their identifiers in the refs attribute, wich allows for a tokenized list of identifier values which must correspond to identifiers which exist in the instance. The authorizedCodeValue attribute can be used to provide a valid code value corresponding to the meaning of the content in the element or attribute when the identified element or attribute does not use an actual valid value from the controlled vocabulary.
XML Source (w/o annotations (1); see within schema source)
